text: Luciano Antonio Macías Argencio (28 May 1935 – 5 August 2022) was an Ecuadorian footballer. He played as a defender. He also played for the Ecuador national team from 1957 to 1969, making twenty-one appearances. Macías died on 5 August 2022 in Guayaquil, Ecuador at the age of 87.Falleció Luciano Macías, leyenda de Barcelona ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Santa Elena Province
title: Luciano Macías
